name: Abhiti Enterprise

idea:
We are on a journey of creating a wealth tech Platform (App) for a niche segment i.e. Women. Our vision is to bridge the gap between knowledge and confidence that Women face while taking financial decisions to become Financially Independent. We believe in building one of the simplest and best mobile platforms for women to make well-informed financial decisions through knowledge and investment actions. Our platform plans to offer community building and engagement of like-minded women to discuss money and financial goals, who believe in financial independence and financial literacy. We believe in creating short stories and video content to educate women about financial independence and investment products to build their confidence in handling their investments. 


We believe women are best in everything, it's time they should be best in handling their investments. And we are here to support them in the best possible ways.
name: FIKAA

idea: We aim to provide HR Analytics services to SMEs and startups that are not focusing on it presently due to budget constraints or resource crunch. We help them to align their organizational goals with the employees by backing up the subjective claims of HR teams with analyzed factual figures. This keeps an efficiency check on each and every part of HR team and also facilitates them use these analysis to help the company become a better space to work with increased employee efficiency.
name: YAHR

idea:
LedMarket.in is an e-commerce start-up company positioning itself to become the market leader in offering online LED Lights & Products to retail shops, distributors and manufacturers. The company offers a business-to-business solution to online merchants of LED products. The company offers all types of LEDâ€™s, raw material and LED Lights that allows online merchants to purchase instantly at wholesale rates by saving their time to travel to main market where they get the same products at same wholesale rates and whereby, they restore customer satisfaction and stimulate repeat sales.


Using website and mobile app, customers can directly browse different products under different categories ranging from LED raw material to LED Lights and Power Supply, etc. The website and mobile shopping app allow customers to purchase their requirement at wholesale rate depending on their quantity.
name: LUMINO CLICK INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Created in India, Zenzi is the best way to enjoy the simplest of healthy habits - drinking water. With the refreshing calorie-free bubbles combined with the hydrating qualities of water, Zenzi is the perfect health-friendly alternative for soft drinks. It is India's first fruit & botanical - infused sparkling water made with natural flavours and no added sugar. Our 4 unique flavours are Lime Ginger, Lychee Rose, Mango Hibiscus, and Watermelon Mint. 


We also strive to achieve clean water and better sanitation facilities for the underprivileged in the country, and 1% of all our sales are contributed towards this goal.
name: STOGI BEVERAGES PRIVATE LIMITED
